sentences.en: Botany Opening during daylight hours and closing at night.
sentences.cn: (花)昼开夜闭的,(花)仅开一天的.

sentences.en: Botany The hood - shaped sepal or corolla of some flowers.
sentences.cn: 盔状花冠(或花萼):某些花朵盔状的花萼或花冠.

sentences.en: Botany, zoology, biochemistry and molecular biology, cell biology, microbiology, genetics, fermentation engineering.
sentences.cn: 植物学, 动物学, 生物化学与分子生物学, 细胞生物学, 微生物学, 遗传学, 发酵工程.

sentences.en: Dr. Williams instructs us in botany.
sentences.cn: 威廉博士教我们植物学.

sentences.en: Economic botany makes significant contributions to anthropology, botany and environmental conservation.
sentences.cn: 经济植物学为人类学 、 植物学和环境保护作出了重要的贡献.

sentences.en: Han Jun is interested in the botany of grasses.
sentences.cn: 韩军对草本植物学非常感兴趣.

sentences.en: I went to that class straight from the botany class, which didn't help me any in understanding either subject.
sentences.cn: 我上完植物学课后直接去上经济学课，不过这对于我理解这两门科目都毫无帮助。

sentences.en: In those days botany was virtually synonymous with herbalism.
sentences.cn: 那时候植物学和本草学实际上是同义的.

sentences.en: Location: Scattered among hedge plants, NW of Institute of Botany.
sentences.cn: 分布: 夹杂在绿篱间或行道树下生长, 随处可见.植物所西北侧后门有超过1.5公尺高的植株.

sentences.en: Objective : In order to provide identifiable ground for Stevia rebaudiana pharmaceutical botany.
sentences.cn: 目的为甜叶菊的生药鉴定提供依据.

sentences.en: The coverage of the subject in his botany text is inadequate.
sentences.cn: 他的植物学教科书中对那题目的叙述不充分.

sentences.en: The first of these in the field of botany were the herbals.
sentences.cn: 在植物学领域,这些最早的著作是本草书.

sentences.en: Through the Middle Ages new written works on botany were very rare.
sentences.cn: 整个中世纪,有关植物学的新著作甚少.

sentences.en: To his 19th-century peers, Robert Brown was the prince of botany.
sentences.cn: 对于19世纪的同行来说，罗伯特·布朗是植物学巨匠。

sentences.en: To what degree are you interested in botany?
sentences.cn: 你对植物学的兴趣达到什么程度?

sentences.en: Zoology and botany are the two main branches of biology.
sentences.cn: 动物学和植物学是生物学的两大分支.

words.tran_cn: 调查研究植物生长情况
